To eliminate the specified data type "c" and substitute every instance of it with its associated original data type, we need to identify the occurrences of "c" in the program and replace them with the original data type.

Looking at the given program, there is no occurrence of the data type "c". Therefore, we don't need to make any modifications to the program.

Here is the final program without any modifications:

```json
{
  "program": "#include <stdio.h>\\n\\nunsigned g;\\nint h[] = {0x92A1D2CDL, 0x92A1D2CDL, 0x92A1D2CDL};\\nstatic unsigned i = 0x06D7L;\\n\\nunsigned fn2() {\\n  for (;;) {\\n    unsigned q = 0xC3L;\\n    int r[5][9][5];\\n    if (h[2])\\n      return q;\\n    g = r[i][i][i];\\n  }\\n}\\n\\nint main() { fn2(); }."
}
```
